titleStmt.title: In memoriam Thomæ Rainsbrough, pro populo, & Parliamento, chiliarchæ fortissimi.

notesStmt.note: Consists of two verses; the first, said to be carved on his tomb, begins "He that made King, Lords, Commons, Judges shake,".
At foot of page: Anno salutis Christianæ 1648. Novemb. 14. Summo cum amore Londinensis militæ in humatus fuit honorabiliter Thomas Rainsbrough justitiæ pugil militaris, libertatis vindex legalis.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
